thread.section_title: Medmastery Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Medmastery | www.medmastery.com
thread.title: Simona Avirvari

author: Simona Avirvari
title: Simona Avirvari
text:
I wanted to have access to Medmastery course library because I was attracted by the way the information is conveid: every new notion has a logical explanation that makes the learning process fun and very productive.
Even when I took courses in wich information was not new for me it helped me to organise my knowlegde, enhancing the ability to quickly access that info when needed in daily practice.
I wish to see more courses being available like for example cardiogenic and hypovolemic shock (including treatment in Accident and Emergency Unit), airway management (including RSI for different pathologies), assessment of chest pain and dispnoea, postresuscitation care - just to name few.
Thank you, Medmastery, I hope you will be here for many years.
All the best,
Simona.
